subject: Fix duration format spec-code discrepancy
description: Aligned spec with existing code behavior. Removed the sub-60s special case from the Duration formatting scenario. Code always uses `{m}m {s}s` format (e.g., "0m 45s"), which is consistent and tested across 160 tests. Evidence: `specs/call-record-integration/spec.md:58` - `- **THEN** the system SHALL format as \`{m}m {s}s\` (e.g., "1m 14s", "0m 45s")`
